pr_title: Added conversion functions between Geometry and GeoJSON format.

timeline.bodyText: In general, importing * is discouraged.  Make sure the imports are expanded.
timeline.author: jagill

timeline.bodyText: It's not a WKT, so the message should reference GeoJSON.
timeline.author: jagill

timeline.bodyText:
Please add tests for:

Empty Geometries (of all types)
Deserializing valid GeoJSON strings
Deserializing invalid GeoJSON strings
timeline.author: jagill

replies.bodyText: Should include valid JSON but invalid GeoJSON, as well as invalid JSON.
replies.author: jagill

timeline.bodyText: Also include a self-crossing LineString, like (0 0, 1 1, 1 0, 0 1).
timeline.author: jagill

timeline.message: Initial commit to support geometry to/from json

timeline.bodyText: This is going to be a problem. I will see if there's any quick fix or workarounds we can do.
timeline.author: walterddr

replies.bodyText:
It looks like the advise is that empty atomic (non-multi) geometries should return null: http://lists.geojson.org/pipermail/geojson-geojson.org/2013-October/000839.html
We can implement this by checking for those cases explicitly, and having GeometryUtils.jsonFromJtsGeometry return an Optional<String>.  In GeoFunctions, if it's empty, return null.  Else return the contained value.
replies.author: jagill

timeline.message:
Support conversion between geometry and json.

Added Geometry functions: geometry_from_geojson and geometry_as_geojson.

Add conversion functions between Geometry and GeoJSON format

Added Geometry functions: geometry_from_geojson and geometry_as_geojson.
Add geo conversion functions: geometry_from_geojson and geometry_as_geojson.
